files.patch:
@@ -13,2 +13,9 @@
-  linux-x64:
-    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
+  test:
+    name: "Test ${{ matrix.os }}"
+    strategy:
+      fail-fast: false
+      max-parallel: 3
+      matrix:
+        os: [ ubuntu-latest, macos-latest, windows-latest ]
+
+    runs-on: ${{ matrix.os }}
@@ -18,1 +25,1 @@

+      uses: actions/checkout@v3
